key: This is the first time I have seen one in real life.
original: This is the first time I have seen one in real life.

key: Damn, I hope they can let me borrow a sword. Every man's dream.
original: Damn, I hope they can let me borrow a sword. Every man's dream.

key: When do blacksmiths usually get up?
original: When do blacksmiths usually get up?

key: Am I here too early? I should have asked someone.
original: Am I here too early? I should have asked someone.

key: I can see her boobs... and her abs...
original: I can see her boobs... and her abs...

key: She’s more athletic looking than the girls at school.
original: She’s more athletic looking than the girls at school.

key: I wish I can get closer...
original: I wish I can get closer...

key: And I think I felt something twitching...
original: And I think I felt something twitching...

key: Sorry, I heard a sound and I wanted to see what it was.
original: Sorry, I heard a sound and I wanted to see what it was.

key: I don’t want her to hit me with that hammer...
original: I don’t want her to hit me with that hammer...

key: This boy is staring way too hard...
original: This boy is staring way too hard...

key: Anyway, I should be coming to you.
original: Anyway, I should be coming to you.

key: You shouldn’t be coming to me.
original: You shouldn’t be coming to me.

key: You have to ring the bell.
original: You have to ring the bell.

key: At the front. There should be a sign.
original: At the front. There should be a sign.

key: I don’t think there is such a thing.
original: I don’t think there is such a thing.

key: After all, I made it myself!
original: After all, I made it myself!

key: Hmm. She doesn’t seem upset at me spying.
original: Hmm. She doesn’t seem upset at me spying.

key: Under the sign, the board states: "Ring the bell before coming in"
original: Under the sign, the board states: "Ring the bell before coming in"

key: I’m sorry for not seeing the board.
original: I’m sorry for not seeing the board.

key: I hope I didn’t interrupt your work.
original: I hope I didn’t interrupt your work.

key: I own and run this establishment.
original: I own and run this establishment.

key: Nice to meet you, little boy!
original: Nice to meet you, little boy!

key: I moved back here. I’m living with my auntie and her daughter.
original: I moved back here. I’m living with my auntie and her daughter.

key: I want to grow up and be a farmer, and help my family.
original: I want to grow up and be a farmer, and help my family.

key: So is there anything you were looking for?
original: So is there anything you were looking for?

key: Um... may I ask why you were naked earlier?
original: Um... may I ask why you were naked earlier?

key: Better try and ease his worries.
original: Better try and ease his worries.

key: Plus, the clothes is too restrictive.
original: Plus, the clothes is too restrictive.

key: So I like to work without one. Feels more natural.
original: So I like to work without one. Feels more natural.

key: I'm the dangerous. It must be afraid of me.
original: I'm the dangerous. It must be afraid of me.

key: How come you put an apron on then?
original: How come you put an apron on then?

key: That's a different story. Because you're here.
original: That's a different story. Because you're here.

key: I'm not that open to let everyone see me naked.
original: I'm not that open to let everyone see me naked.

key: That’s why I made the bell.
original: That’s why I made the bell.

key: So I’m not naked when someone come in.
original: So I’m not naked when someone come in.

key: Everyone rings the bell before coming here.
original: Everyone rings the bell before coming here.

key: For the first time, you are the only one going straight inside.
original: For the first time, you are the only one going straight inside.

key: I thought those were just decorations.
original: I thought those were just decorations.

key: No. They seem to like it.
original: No. They seem to like it.

key: But believe it or not, we attract a lot of business.
original: But believe it or not, we attract a lot of business.

key: This area is agricultural, not a town for hunting.
original: This area is agricultural, not a town for hunting.

key: But there are a lot of visitors from outside lands and they travel to other places.
original: But there are a lot of visitors from outside lands and they travel to other places.

key: A lot of the time, they stay in the caves to get fighting experience.
original: A lot of the time, they stay in the caves to get fighting experience.

key: You’re the first customer in a while who actually lives here.
original: You’re the first customer in a while who actually lives here.

key: When you finish, maybe you’ll become an adventurer, who knows?
original: When you finish, maybe you’ll become an adventurer, who knows?

key: I think you’d make a better one than me.
original: I think you’d make a better one than me.

key: I saw your muscles. You have a huge powerful frame.
original: I saw your muscles. You have a huge powerful frame.

key: And your stomach. Your ab muscles are so taut and tight.
original: And your stomach. Your ab muscles are so taut and tight.

key: I guess you must be on some sort of steroids, right?
original: I guess you must be on some sort of steroids, right?

key: You don’t have to use steroids to accumulate muscle mass.
original: You don’t have to use steroids to accumulate muscle mass.

key: I don’t think that stuff is available out here.
original: I don’t think that stuff is available out here.

key: After all, steroids are for city people.
original: After all, steroids are for city people.

key: I don’t think I’ve seen a woman that looks like you.
original: I don’t think I’ve seen a woman that looks like you.

key: I’m going to assume you’re not insulting me.
original: I’m going to assume you’re not insulting me.

key: N-no, of course not. I work out too.
original: N-no, of course not. I work out too.

key: Your body is way bigger and stronger than mine though.
original: Your body is way bigger and stronger than mine though.

key: Not to mention how sexy she is...
original: Not to mention how sexy she is...

key: I want to lick her abs...
original: I want to lick her abs...

key: And I do like working out.
original: And I do like working out.

key: Having abs comes mostly from diet though.
original: Having abs comes mostly from diet though.

key: Plenty of good food to eat around here.
original: Plenty of good food to eat around here.

key: You’re way too beautiful to be on steroids.
original: You’re way too beautiful to be on steroids.

key: If you were on steroids, you’d look and sound masculine.
original: If you were on steroids, you’d look and sound masculine.

key: But your muscles are perfect, and you look very feminine.
original: But your muscles are perfect, and you look very feminine.

key: And more importantly, your face is really cute.
original: And more importantly, your face is really cute.

key: Is a boy I met a few minutes ago hitting on me?
original: Is a boy I met a few minutes ago hitting on me?

key: Your eyes make me uncomfortable if you keep looking at me.
original: Your eyes make me uncomfortable if you keep looking at me.

key: He-he... Sorry, I was thinking about school.
original: He-he... Sorry, I was thinking about school.

key: How come you’re not there now?
original: How come you’re not there now?

key: So \n[1], was there anything you needed?
original: So \n[1], was there anything you needed?

key: Ah, Yeah! Can you make me a key?
original: Ah, Yeah! Can you make me a key?

key: Here’s a print of the key.
original: Here’s a print of the key.

key: It’s on some soap. Is that fine?
original: It’s on some soap. Is that fine?

key: I need it. For a backup key.
original: I need it. For a backup key.

key: This is really well-done. And your attitude is completely serious.
original: This is really well-done. And your attitude is completely serious.

key: Like this is a run-of-the-mill job for you.
original: Like this is a run-of-the-mill job for you.

key: Are you sure you’re not a criminal?
original: Are you sure you’re not a criminal?

key: It’s the key to my room.
original: It’s the key to my room.

key: I made a print of it because I lent the key to my cousin.
original: I made a print of it because I lent the key to my cousin.

key: She helped me make the mold.
original: She helped me make the mold.

key: Even if you were a criminal, I’d do it.
original: Even if you were a criminal, I’d do it.

key: Because of how cute you were.
original: Because of how cute you were.

key: I’d have to let the police know though if there was a break-in though.
original: I’d have to let the police know though if there was a break-in though.

key: But I’d give you advance notice.
original: But I’d give you advance notice.

key: Can I borrow one of your weapons instead?
original: Can I borrow one of your weapons instead?

key: Here you go. That will be \c[17]100\c[0]\i[172].
original: Here you go. That will be \c[17]100\c[0]\i[172].

key: I thought you will do it for free. We have a nice talk after all.
original: I thought you will do it for free. We have a nice talk after all.

key: I will bite dirt to live if I do so.
original: I will bite dirt to live if I do so.

key: Money is for raw materials only.
original: Money is for raw materials only.

key: Listen, I have a question for you, \C[2]Danesia\c[0].
original: Listen, I have a question for you, \C[2]Danesia\c[0].

key: Do you have any tools to cut a hole in a wall?
original: Do you have any tools to cut a hole in a wall?

key: It’s from a DIY manufacturing company called DIY.
original: It’s from a DIY manufacturing company called DIY.

key: If I remember right, you already bought one from me.
original: If I remember right, you already bought one from me.

key: Yeah, can you take off your clothes again?
original: Yeah, can you take off your clothes again?

key: Come on, ma'am! You work in the nude though.
original: Come on, ma'am! You work in the nude though.

key: OK. I was joking. I’ll leave you alone now.
original: OK. I was joking. I’ll leave you alone now.

key: Don’t do anything illegal with those tools!
original: Don’t do anything illegal with those tools!

key: Alright! I got what I need.
original: Alright! I got what I need.

key: Auntie will be in the barn in the morning.
original: Auntie will be in the barn in the morning.

key: This is the perfect time for me to dig a hole in her room.
original: This is the perfect time for me to dig a hole in her room.

key: Tell me if you need anything.
original: Tell me if you need anything.

key: My weapon looks like brand new!
original: My weapon looks like brand new!

key: I could feel her heart beating again!!!
original: I could feel her heart beating again!!!

key: Come back again if you need my skill.
original: Come back again if you need my skill.

key: What is wrong with that guy?
original: What is wrong with that guy?

key: He's working in the military. The young lad is just casually calling for low class soldier.
original: He's working in the military. The young lad is just casually calling for low class soldier.

key: But I feel a bit insulted.
original: But I feel a bit insulted.

key: it feels like a lot of people like that have come here.
original: it feels like a lot of people like that have come here.

key: You still don't believe how famous am I, do you?
original: You still don't believe how famous am I, do you?

key: I'm the best blacksmith in here,
original: I'm the best blacksmith in here,

key: even the Dwarf come here to learn my forging technique.
original: even the Dwarf come here to learn my forging technique.

key: You're literally only one blacksmith in this town.
original: You're literally only one blacksmith in this town.

key: it's really awesome if the second part is true.
original: it's really awesome if the second part is true.

key: Everyone knows Dwarfs are forging masters, they were born for that job
original: Everyone knows Dwarfs are forging masters, they were born for that job

key: and they came here to learn from her.
original: and they came here to learn from her.

key: Can you fix this Axe for me?
original: Can you fix this Axe for me?

key: It was his great, great grandfather's axe.
original: It was his great, great grandfather's axe.

key: You got bamboozled by that old gramps!
original: You got bamboozled by that old gramps!

key: This thing gotta be in a river for thousands of years.
original: This thing gotta be in a river for thousands of years.

key: I guess he somehow fish it up.
original: I guess he somehow fish it up.

key: The handle can no longer be used.
original: The handle can no longer be used.

key: The blade is heavily damaged and cannot be repaired by sharpening alone.
original: The blade is heavily damaged and cannot be repaired by sharpening alone.

key: but I can use the axe head to forge a new one.
original: but I can use the axe head to forge a new one.

key: I need a big one just like me.
original: I need a big one just like me.

key: First is Axe now a big Hammer!?
original: First is Axe now a big Hammer!?

key: What are those things used for?
original: What are those things used for?

key: \c[17]1500\c[0]\i[172] for your Axe and a Hammer.
original: \c[17]1500\c[0]\i[172] for your Axe and a Hammer.

key: You can come here tomorrow at this hour to get them.
original: You can come here tomorrow at this hour to get them.

key: Here are your Axe and Hammer!
original: Here are your Axe and Hammer!

key: Should I go in without ringing the bell?
original: Should I go in without ringing the bell?

key: Didn't I tell you to ring the bell?
original: Didn't I tell you to ring the bell?

key: I'm sorry, I forgot that small detail.
original: I'm sorry, I forgot that small detail.

key: Because I only remember the big details.
original: Because I only remember the big details.

key: Just keep it in mind next time.
original: Just keep it in mind next time.
